item.description:
FREE Introductory Zumbatomic速 Class (for Kids aged 4-12)

"Kids get fit, rock out and have a blast.

Zumbatomic速 classes are high-energy fitness-parties that offer real results. Packed with specially choreographed routines and the latest music, like hip-hop, reggaeton and cumbia, Zumbatomic classes increase focus and self-confidence, boost metabolism and improve coordination. More than just a great reason to head to the gym, Zumbatomic classes make getting fit a fun family experience too."

Space is limited.

If interested, RSVP to Victoria.
[Octoryrose @yahoo.com -- no spaces]
